title: ðŸ“¬ Mailbag Monday: Who is the best football player not currently in the NFL? (Football 7/27)
description:
Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech link up for Mailbag Monday, answering listeners' questions. First, the guys rank the Super Bowl winning teams from the past decade (and for Ryan: the best Super Bowls of the last 10 years) (8:30). Next, who is the best football player not in the NFL (34:00)? Is it Andrew Luck, Trevor Lawrence or someone else? The Superfriends are presented with a few football scenarios and then react to a mailbag from their former colleague Sean Wagner-McGough (54:00).
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â
